ModMetaData.name: [JDS] StarWars - Phase I Clone Armor
ModMetaData.author: JangoD'soul
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/p7Fv1Z6.gif[/img]
This mod adds Helmets and armors from StarWars Clone Wars
[h1]Features:[/h1] - Adds 16 Phase I Clone Helmets - Adds 8 Armor - Adds 1 Apparel - Adds 26 Equipment - Adds 2 Backpack
[b]If you have probelms/issue or want to help me develops more just join my [url=https://discord.com/invite/ZYFEhyNrES]Discord[/url].[/b]
Credit: Star Wars - George Lucas [url=https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/] CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 [/url]
[b]You may create patches or translation for this mod, as long as you do not re-upload artwork or code.
Do NOT upload this mod on other websites.[/b]
